commit.message: 实验6，使用Services功能，利用从文本文件里读取订单数据，读取后的数据类型是json格式的，在通过directive将数据渲染到index.html页面  --from chenxudong 08号

files.patch:
@@ -96,7 +96,10 @@

Bootstrap starter template

Use this document as a way to quickly start any new project.
All you get is this text and a mostly barebones HTML document.

- + {{aas[0]["name"]}} + {{aas[1]["age"]}} + +
订单编号

@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+[{
+	"orderId": "001",
+	"storage": "storage1",
+	"people": "chenxudong",
+	"orderDateTime": "2015-11-26",
+	"orderStatus": "theStatus",
+	"notes": "theNotes"
+}, {
+	"orderId": "002",
+	"storage": "storage2",
+	"people": "dongdong",
+	"orderDateTime": "2015-11-27",
+	"orderStatus": "theStatus",
+	"notes": "theNotes"
+}]
\ No newline at end of file
